alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp; Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp; Northern Denali Borough; Southern Denali Borough (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 19 at 1:37PM AKST until November 21 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM MONDAY TO 6 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...East winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern Denali Borough, Southern Denali Borough, Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp and Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp. * WHEN...From 3 PM Monday to 6 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Travel may be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Recent snowfall will cause blowing and drifting snow with reduced visibility. Travel may be particularly difficult over summits.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp; Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp; Northern Denali Borough; Southern Denali Borough
